House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00528
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING BATAS PAMBANSA BLG. 68 OR THE CORPORATION CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES
ABSTRACT : Allows corporations perpetual existence, removes minimum number of incorporators and allows one person corporations; aims to improve ease of doing business by allowing electronic submission and on-line registration the stockholders and deters abuses, fraud and graft; provides solutions to the problem of perpetual holdovers; and, fortifies the regulatory powers of the Commission.
